title: Can I Reupload your Videos on my YouTube Channel and Earn from it?
transcript: salaam dr zakir naik i'm hilar from pakistan welcome i'm a big fan of you and i have learned so much from your videos on youtube i want to get permission to re-upload your videos on my youtube channel so people will be benefited from those videos because your videos are full of knowledge and i want to get permission to earn money from that on youtube please sir give me permission thank you the brother from pakistan asked a question that can you upload my youtube videos and can you earn from it basically all my material where the books where the booklets where the videos have got no copyright you're most welcome you only tell them don't edit it don't add your own into it so if anyone uploads my video on his youtube there's no problem at all what some people do is that when i upload on my channel you know maybe in a few days it reaches about five hundred thousand what they do they take the same video for my channel and then they may add something with it with a photograph of an actress dr zakir knight speaks on ashford who they share i did not know googled up and came to the actress i did not speak what they do to attract people so my video reaches 500 000 in few days they uploaded later on they reached a million anyway doing all these things according to me haram i don't complain and take it out and they earn more money by this i said you want the money i will earn the salah because of your thing which is haram people are watching my video you get the money i'm not complaining i'll get the salad so there's no copyright many people do this as far as you're concerned brother don't do these activities it's not islamic but you want to upload the videos no problem please don't edit it you earn money i've got no problem we've never read flag it will never go to youtube and say that is our video unless someone has altered or manipulated my videos are copyright free because of which the viewer on my channel is less i'm aware of that because we have uploaded only 1880 videos as of few days back 1880 videos actually when you google and see top dr zakir naik you will get at least 12 to 14 million out of which you know websites etc if you check videos 9 million that means there are 9 million videos of mine available according to google search mostly on the youtube and other social media nine million how many have we uploaded less than two thousand that means four and a half thousand times more other people are four and a half thousand times in percentage wise 450 000 percent more so why should object they are giving me saba some are doing haram by doing certain things they're getting audience from me i get the sava they get the money some people are doing for earning but not doing haram i've got no opposition at all so if you want to use my videos i give you permission don't tamper with it please keep it and see to it that the quality is good now most of our new videos on youtube are high quality some on high definition some on 4k maintain the quality i'll be thankful to you
